explains: adj. 可爱的；讨人喜欢的；引起爱情的

sentences.en: He has an endearing habit of licking his lips when he's nervous.
sentences.cn: 他有个紧张时舔嘴唇的可爱习惯。

sentences.en: Scientists have explored this idea with other endearing creatures: babies.
sentences.cn: 科学家们用其他可爱的生物来探索这个想法：婴儿。

sentences.en: She has such an endearing personality.
sentences.cn: 她有个如此招人喜爱的个性。
